thread.title: Gold Trades in Narrow Range Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report
thread.title_full: Gold Trades in Narrow Range Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report - WSJ

author: Biman Mukherji
title: Gold Trades in Narrow Range Ahead of U.S. Jobs Report
text: 0137 GMT [Dow Jones] Gold prices are trading in a narrow range in Asian Friday, ahead of the release of the U.S. jobs report later in the day. Positive jobs data is likely to reinforce expectations that the Fed may raise interest rates soon, likely strengthening the dollar and weakening gold prices. Physical demand for gold in Asia has picked up as prices are hovering near a five-year low in the run up to peak holiday and festival season demand.
